title: ISweepFeatureData.FeatureScope
description: Gets or sets whether to use scope in a multibody part for this sweep feature.
returns: When: true (default), only specified bodies in the multibody part are affected by the sweep feature false, all of the bodies in the multibody part are affected by the sweep feature
remarks:
The sweep feature is expanded along the plane on which the feature is created and affects all or only the specified bodies it intersects. Use
ISweepFeatureData::FeatureScopeBodies
to specify the bodies.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
